name: Breeding fish
description:
Controls: 

Click on UFO to switch scenes
Drag + drop UFO to collect fish
Drag + drop fish or eggs to move them into the breeding machine, fish tanks or garbage window
Hover over fish and eggs to see their properties (properties of eggs are hidden until matches are discovered)
Click the red button to start breeding

Find the fish with the required properties and breed it with an egg!

-----

We found a planet where species are able to breathe underwater. Our breeding machine should be able to find a compatible specimen for our gene pool. Make sure to collect some and try to breed them in order to secure our dominance in this sector!

Fly out with the UFO by clicking on it to collect some specimen and bring them back to the mothership. Control the UFO via drag and drop.

Breed fish with alien eggs to find out what compatible properties we need. Drag and drop fish and alien eggs into the breeding machine and hit the red button. Make sure to clean the output in order to breed again.

The inspector will show you your target properties. If you find a fish that's fully compatible, breed them with an egg to reach the next level of evolution!

Background music is from an asset pack I once purchased in the Humble store.
